channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Canada’s Assisted Suicide Regime Is the West’s Cry for Help
item.description: Even mainstream secular outlets are noticing the horrors and abuse of legalized euthanasia.

item.title: Emotional Teenage Girl James Comey Speaks In Taylor Swift Lyrics In Unhinged Anti-Trump Screed
item.description: From here on, pay no attention to Comey, unless he says something of substance (he won't) and backs it up with authenticated documents.

item.title: Putin’s ‘Peace’ Proposal Would Be a Prelude to More War
item.description: The Russian president is demanding a steep price for peace — on terms so favorable for Moscow that it would likely be a temporary reprieve.

item.title: The Ukraine War Was Always Going To End This Way
item.description: From the very beginning it was clear that Ukraine’s borders, a relic of Soviet propaganda, would have to change.

item.title: Why Sex And The City Could Never Be A Fairy Tale
item.description: Sex and the City feminism sees living like a bad man as the key to empowering women to live the good life.

item.title: Republican Stacy Garrity seeks to challenge Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro's reelection bid
item.description: Stacy Garrity, Pennsylvania's two-term elected state treasurer, said Monday that she will seek the Republican nomination to challenge Democratic Gov. ...

item.title: Using Tax Incentives to Improve Our Economic Statistics
item.description: Higher participation rates, as well as more timely and accurate responses, are necessary to improve the performance of our economic surveys.

item.title: The Persecution of the Little Sisters of the Poor
item.description: The relentless litigation targeting a Catholic order of nuns is deeply alarming.

item.title: Democracy’s Machine Learning Problem
item.description: We can’t let either artificial intelligence or demagogic politicians tell us exactly what we want to hear.

item.title: I Lost My Freedom, Money, And Guns Based On No Evidence And With No Chance To Defend Myself
item.description: When accusation becomes law, fatherhood becomes a crime.

item.title: Trump Reclassifying Marijuana Would Be A Huge Political Blunder
item.description: Legalizing or downgrading the classification of pot was not a campaign promise by Trump, but was instead apparently raised by a donor at a fundraising...

item.description: The District of Columbia remains in political turmoil after President Trump declared a safety-inspired "takeover" of the city's streets, with a federa...

item.title: Trump administration halts visas for people from Gaza after Laura Loomer questions arrivals
item.description: A day after conservative activist Laura Loomer posted videos on social media of children from Gaza arriving in the U.S. for medical treatment and ques...

item.title: Trump to meet Zelenskyy with sweetener for peace deal but land swaps still a major sticking point
